content: ‪this simple pair of ribbed gloves are a wonderful way to use up small amounts of leftover stash yarn they also make nice gifts that work up quickly and can be easily modified i created this pattern for #freeartfriday to allow me to swiftly work up a few pairs of gloves which‬ i then place out in the world for people to find a video tutorial for this pattern can be found here https //youtu be/621zwj2ds2m
